Articles.Content:
Here you can share your nostalgic thoughts and tell your stories from 0.17 and below. You can post old screenshots, mission reports, etc...

Also, feel free to re-create a Old-KSP-style mission using any mod that adds the old parts.
The first mission i ever undertook, before the days of persistence/ maps.
Wish I knew how to take screenshots back then...
Was bored one day, so i pressed random buttons and, much more recently, was going through old files, went on screenshots and had that feeling of nostalgia.

Wish I knew how to take screenshots back then...

Same! I don't have any pictures from back then but I watched a lets play the other day that reminded me of all the little things id forgot

Oh, the things I remember. Af first, I would launch straight up until my apoapsis reached 100 km. Then, just about 20 seconds before I reached it, I turned completely horizontal and burnt for my life. Obviously, my rockets were enormous and almost never reached orbit.
I remember back in 0.16 when I started, all of my rockets blew up at exactly 11 kilometers. To this day I still don't know why they did.
